about.description: ATD Briques Durables turns your construction projects into reality. With over 15 years of experience, we are your trusted partner for all your sustainable construction needs.

faq.question: What types of construction projects do you carry out?
faq.answer: We carry out all types of projects: new construction, renovation, extension, demolition, foundations and exterior finishing work.

faq.question: Do you offer free quotes?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer free consultations and quotes for all your projects. Our team travels to assess your needs.

faq.question: What are your response times?
faq.answer: Deadlines vary depending on the complexity of the project. We are committed to respecting agreed deadlines and keeping you informed throughout the site.

faq.question: Do you use eco-friendly materials?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We prioritize sustainable and environmentally friendly materials in all our construction projects.

faq.question: Are you insured for the work?
faq.answer: Yes, we have all the necessary insurance: civil liability, ten-year warranty and construction insurance for your peace of mind.
